API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.x trunk

sandy.animation.MD3AnimationCfg

type
class
MD3 animation.cfg file utils

Static Methods

read(b : sandy.Bytes, names : Array<String>, types : Array<String>, ?md3numbering : Bool) : Hash<Animation>

parameters
b Input bytes
names Name for each animation line
types Animation type string for each line
md3numbering Standard MD3 files have a strange way of numbering frames in player animations. Turn on to enable correct frame numbers
Reads an animation.cfg file from bytes, returning an array of Animation instances. For each animation line, there should be a corresponding name and type. Lines are parsed in order, so name0 corresponds to type0 which is applied to the first line of frame animation data.
